EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower - Solar System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Ms {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for contacting SunPower, we appreciate your interest in our products.
In order to provide a free of charge personalized quotation for your solar system, we would need to send your request to our certified SunPower Partner who will get in contact with you and fix an appointment for a site visit.
In order to proceed, we kindly ask you to provide or confirm the following information:
- Are you the owner of the property? - What is the address of the installation? - Which side is it oriented to (South/East/West/North)? - Size of the roof space available for installation or kW you would like to install. - Are there any shadows on the roof? - When would you like to have the panels installed?
As soon as we receive all the details, we will forward the request to SunPower Authorized Partner who will then contact you.
We remain at your disposal for any further information and we look forward to hearing from you.
Best Regards
{!User.Name} | SunPower UK Customer Service
SUNPOWER | 0808-2818718| SunPowerUK@sunpowercorp.com
